title: Spies of Mordor (2U92)
text:
Set:	Mines of Moria
Kind:	Shadow
Culture:	Sauron
Twilight:	1
Card Type:	Condition
Game Text:	Search. To play, spot a [Sauron] Orc. Plays to your support area. Each time the fellowship moves during the regroup phase, you may draw a card (or 2 cards if you spot a [Sauron] tracker).
Lore:	”'Mordor Orcs patrol the Eastern Shore. We must wait for the cover of darkness.'”
Rarity:	U
